title: Installation issue: gcc
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install gcc @10.2.0 %apple-clang-12.2.0
...
Comparing stages 2 and 3
Bootstrap comparison failure!
gcc/tree-ssa-operands.o differs
gcc/tree-ssanames.o differs
gcc/ipa-inline.o differs
gcc/tree-ssa-pre.o differs
gcc/gimple-loop-interchange.o differs
gcc/collect2.o differs
gcc/tree-ssa-loop-split.o differs
...
```

### Information on your system

```
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.0-449-5ac05db91
* **Python:** 3.8.5
* **Platform:** darwin-bigsur-skylake
* **Concretizer:** original
```

### Additional information

* [spack-build-out.txt](https://www.dropbox.com/s/y0zx2k72nl3rwbk/spack-build-out.txt?dl=0)
* [spack-build-env.txt](https://gist.github.com/eschnett/59f9699f3b07b7cd5c52f3ba15210baa)

@michaelkuhn

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
